pli-tv-kd13:21.1.2: dvīhappaṭicchannāyo → dvīhapaṭicchannāyo (bj, sya-all); dvīhapaṭicchannā (pts-vp-pli1ed); dvīhappaṭicchannā (mr evaṃ yāvadasāhappaṭicchannā)
pli-tv-kd13:24.1.15: itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ → itarampi māsaparivāsaṃ (bj, sya-all, mr)
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.61: itarampi māsaṃ parivāsassa → itarampi māsaparivāsassa (bj, mr); itarassapi māsaparivāsassa (sya-all)
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.65: itarampi māsaṃ parivāso → itarampi māsaparivāso (bj, mr); itaropi māsaparivāso (sya-all)
pli-tv-kd13:36.1.1: Idaṃ navakaṃ porāṇapotthakesu avisuddhivaseneva āgataṃ, vuccamānatatiyanavakena ca saṃsaṭṭhaṃ. Taṃ paṭivisodhakehi asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ katvā visuṃ patiṭṭhāpitaṃ. si , sya-all potthakesu pana taṃ visuddhivaseneva āgataṃ. Taṃ panevaṃ veditabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:36.2.26: āpattīhi → ayaṃ paṭhamavāro bj, sya-all potthakesu paripuṇṇo
pli-tv-kd13:36.3.13: āpattīhi → imepi cattāro vārā bj, sya-all potthakesu paripuṇṇā
pli-tv-kd13:36.4.64: Mūlā aṭṭhārasa visuddhato → mūlāyapaṭivisuddhako (bj); mūlaṭṭhārasa Visuddhito (sya-all); mūlā pannarasa visuddhato (pts-vp-pli1ed); mūlā pannarasa Visuddhato (mr)
